title: The Start of the Hunt
creation_date: c. first half of the 18th century
medium: pen and ink and ink wash on paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Charles Parrocel [1688-1752], Paris, France. Jean Masson [1856-1933], Amiens and Paris, France (Lugt 1494a) [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. His collector's mark is stamped on the drawing.
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
